name: Peking University Open Research Data
description: The PKU Open Research Data provides preservation, management and distribution services for research data. It encourages data owners to share data and data users to reuse data. PKU library cooperates with NSFC-PKU data center for management science, PKU science and research department, and PKU social sciences department to jointly launch the platform.
owner_name: Peking University Library and associated university departments
tags: Computer Science, Systems and Electrical Engineering
